name: As Above So Below Bureaucrats Are Working Slow
name_original: As Above So Below Bureaucrats Are Working Slow
description:
Turns out the afterlife is an office building full of bureaucrats. And you have to talk your way out of this whole situation to go either further ABOVE or further BELOW.

It's a narrative heavy game with a bunch of characters and lot's of dialogue options to choose from. Developed for Epic Mega Jam 2022.

You can also pet a DOG in this game.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Look around
  • E/LMB - Interact
Credits

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - Writing, Programming, Level Design

Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - Level Design, Environment Art, Programming, Writing
